member.name: M:OxyPlot.Wpf.PlotViewBase.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when an unhandled MouseDown attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class. Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
member.param: The that contains the event data. This event data reports details about the mouse button that was pressed and the handled state.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.Wpf.PlotViewBase.OnMouseMove(System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs)

member.param: The that contains the event data.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.Wpf.PlotViewBase.OnMouseUp(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when an unhandled MouseUp routed event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class. Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
member.param: The that contains the event data. The event data reports that the mouse button was released.

member.name: T:OxyPlot.Wpf.TrackerDefinition
member.remarks: The tracker definitions make it possible to show different trackers for different series. The property is matched with the in the TrackerDefinitions collection in the control.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.Wpf.TrackerDefinition.TrackerKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the tracker key.
member.remarks: The Plot will use this property to find the TrackerDefinition that matches the TrackerKey of the current series.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.Wpf.TrackerDefinition.TrackerTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the tracker template.
member.remarks: The tracker control will be added/removed from the Tracker overlay as necessary. The DataContext of the tracker will be set to a TrackerHitResult with the current tracker data.
